descr.SourceString: Makes you Acquainted and grants further diplomatic options in the future.
descr.LocalizedString: Makes you Acquainted and grants further diplomatic options in the future.

descr.SourceString: Makes you Acquainted and grants further diplomatic options in the future.
descr.LocalizedString: Makes you Acquainted and grants further diplomatic options in the future.

descr.SourceString: When accepted ENSURES PEACE for next 1 YEAR.
descr.LocalizedString: When accepted ENSURES PEACE for next 1 YEAR.

descr.SourceString: When accepted ENSURES PEACE for next 1 YEAR.
descr.LocalizedString: When accepted ENSURES PEACE for next 1 YEAR.

descr.SourceString: Unless recipient declares war, reduces recipient's INFLUENCE by 50.
descr.LocalizedString: Unless recipient declares war, reduces recipient's INFLUENCE by 50.

only_me.Text: I'm the true sovereign around here. I expect ot have your alliegence.

descr.SourceString: If recipient accepts, becomes a VASSAL. If rejects, recipient loses 50 INFLUENCE.
descr.LocalizedString: If recipient accepts, becomes a VASSAL. If rejects, recipient loses 50 INFLUENCE.

only_me_accept.Text: You are the greatest Lord. I bow before you.

descr.SourceString: BECOME VASSAL . {br} Must heed to all your sovereign's REQUESTS. Becomes an ALLY.
descr.LocalizedString: BECOME VASSAL . {br} Must heed to all your sovereign's REQUESTS. Becomes an ALLY.

only_me_decline.Text: I won't bow to you. Keep your hands off my fiefdom.

war_hate.Text: I won't tolerate your insults. Our courage shall be tested in battle!

need_inf.Text: I need your support for my claims.

return_silver.Text: In return I'm offering you a payment in silver.

throw_gauntlet.Text: Disavow your filthy insults, or I shall meet you in battle.

claim_press.Text: I hereby declare to be the rightful heir to the lands of

descr.SourceString: Presses a CLAIM towards a Region.
descr.LocalizedString: Presses a CLAIM towards a Region.

claim_refute.Text: I refute your unfounded claim to the land of

claim_accept.Text: I accept your claim to the lands of

descr.SourceString: Give away the rights to a disputed Region.
descr.LocalizedString: Give away the rights to a disputed Region.

threat_silver.Text: In return, nothing bad will happen to your cute little town.

descr.SourceString: If recipient declines, declares sender and the recipient as Enemies.
descr.LocalizedString: If recipient declines, declares sender and the recipient as Enemies.

descr.SourceString: Accepts a quest to gather funds.
descr.LocalizedString: Accepts a quest to gather funds.

threat_silver_give_time.Text: I'm willing to give you more time, but don't fail me.

descr.SourceString: If recipient accepts, it starts a quest to pay in a number of months.
descr.LocalizedString: If recipient accepts, it starts a quest to pay in a number of months.

threat_silver_give_time_accept.Text: I shall pay by this time. I promise.

descr.SourceString: After the agreed time passes, transfers Silver from your Treasury to the Recipient.
descr.LocalizedString: After the agreed time passes, transfers Silver from your Treasury to the Recipient.

threat_silver_give_time_decline.Text: It's not enough time for me. I can't accept.

threat_silver_no_time.Text: Don't haggle with me, pay up now or you'll find yourself in a pickle.

descr.SourceString: Refuses to give additional time to pay.
descr.LocalizedString: Refuses to give additional time to pay.

threat_silver_no_time_accept.Text: Seems I have no choice then. I'll pay.

threat_silver_refuse.Text: You can stick your threats where the sun doesn't shine.

peace_silver.Text: We can stop this bloodshed... For a price.

descr.SourceString: Offers peace and abandoning all Claims towards the Recipient's Regions in return for Treasury.
descr.LocalizedString: Offers peace and abandoning all Claims towards the Recipient's Regions in return for Treasury.

peace_silver_accept.Text: If that is the price of peace, I accept.

peace_silver_cant.Text: Even if I wanted, I can't afford it.

send_promised_cash.Text: I'm sending the money I promised.

descr.SourceString: Sends previously agreed funds to the Recipient.
descr.LocalizedString: Sends previously agreed funds to the Recipient.

cancel_promised_cash.Text: Forget our deal, I can't send you any money.

hope_rumors_not_true.Text: I hope the rumors about you are not true.

your_days_are_over.Text: The days of your villany are almost over.
